smartschool_pp_description: The full experience ‚Äî with fun, personal touches.
quick_start_description: Step-by-step instructions to set up and configure your Smartschool++
roadmap_description: Discover upcoming features and our development timeline
github_description: Access source code, report issues, and contribute to development
discord_description: Join our community for real-time support and discussions
release_notes_description: Stay updated with latest changes and version history
about_us_description: Learn about our team, and contributors
step_1: Go to the Webstore and look for Smartschool++, or Lite
click_install: Click Download & then allow all the required permissions
go_to_your_smartschool: Go to your Smartschool & refresh the page.
click_settings_button: Click the Settings button in the top right
try_settings: Try out some settings and watch them update in real-time
close_settings_desc: Close the settings by clicking anywhere outside of the settings
click_edit_button: Click the edit button at the top left to enter
open_drawer_desc: Open the drawer at the top to grab some widgets
drop_widgets_desc: Place the widgets in existing panels or create new ones
stow_away_desc: Store your widgets by dropping them back in the drawer
open_quick_desc: Open the quick menu using the : key
type_it_out_desc: Look up any function in quick menu, for example "planner"
navigate_menu_desc: Use Tab to navigate and Enter to confirm your choice
save_quicks_desc: Use "quick add" to save a shortcut. Enter a name: (eg. google), then a value (URL): (e.g. https://google.com)
change_weather_location: How do I change my weather location?
weather_location_desc: Click on the current location in the widget and type out your own location.
install_issue_desc: On school laptops or school wifi, it might be blocked. Try a different browser or use Lite.
compatible_desc: Yes, both Smarter Smartschool and Smartest Smartschool are compatible. But don't forget to disable the Smarter themes
which_browsers: On which browsers can I install?
browsers_desc: You can use any Chromium based browser like Opera or Edge. Firefox users can follow our guide on Discord.
other_questions_desc: You can reach out in our official Smartschool++ Discord server.
error_game_start: Help! I'm lost! Click around to find me!
response_lost_1: I've been wandering these woods for 404 days!
response_lost_2: This forest has no WiFi... how do I get home?
response_lost_3: I tried to follow the breadcrumbs but they were 404'd!
response_coding_1: My code works perfectly... it just doesn't do what you want!
response_coding_2: It's not a bug, it's a feature... that doesn't exist!
response_coding_3: 404: Function not found, but my motivation is also missing!
response_coffee_1: I'm not lost, I'm just caffeinating my way back home!
response_coffee_2: This coffee shop has great WiFi but terrible navigation!
response_coffee_3: I've had 404 cups of coffee and I still can't find the way!
response_home_1: Home is where the WiFi connects automatically!
response_home_2: I keep clicking but I'm still here... send help!
response_home_3: This isn't my house... but I live here now I guess!
meme_1: When you've been looking for the page for 10 minutes
meme_2: Me pretending I know how I got to this 404 page
meme_4: This page is like my ex... nowhere to be found
meme_6: When you realize you've been clicking the same broken link for 5 minutes
sibe_description: Hey! Sibe hier üëã Ik heb het meeste van het widget-systeem gemaakt, de global chat en het quick menu gemaakt en nog wat kleine tweaks aan de games gedaan üéÆ. Niet alles wat wij gemaakt hebben is even nuttig ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, maar ik denk dat ik voor het hele team spreek als ik zeg dat we ongelofelijk veel geleerd hebben van dit hele project üìöüí°. Voor mij is het belangrijkste dat de kwaliteit van dit project gegarandeerd wordt, ook voor volgende generaties.
lukas_description: Doe alleen de dingen die je energie geven, niet die je energie kosten. ‚ö° Deze woorden zijn me bijgebleven uit een gesprek met Jan Schuer, CEO van Smartschool. Met die instelling blijft Smartschool++ geweldig. De Plantü™¥, Delijnüöå, het weerüå¶Ô∏è en de offici√´le website... stuk voor stuk projecten waar ik trots op ben en die samen Smartschool++ vormgeven. Heel erg bedankt aan iedereen die ons sinds dag 1 heeft gesteund ‚ù§Ô∏è.
bjarne_description: Hey hey, ik ben Bjarne! Mijn focus ligt op het verbeteren van de gebruikerservaring door UI-bugs te fixen üêõ en quality of life-verbeteringen toe te voegen ‚ú®. Mijn werk zie je op bijna elke pagina, ook al valt het niet altijd meteen op, voel je ongetwijfeld het verschil. ‚ù§Ô∏è naar iedereen die ons steunt en gebruik maakt van Smartschool++

js_lessons_afternoon: Check which lessons you have in the afternoon

js_homework_check: Quickly check if you made your homework
